Package imagingbook.lib.math.nonlinear

Class NonlinearLeastSquares

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.math.nonlinear.NonlinearLeastSquares
  • public abstract class NonlinearLeastSquares
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility methods for simplified access to nonlinear least-squares solvers in Apache Commons Math. Hides much of the available configuration options. If other than default settings are needed, the original API should be used. TODO: Needs cleanup and tests.

    • Method Detail

      • solveNLS

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector solveNLS​(org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction V,
                                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction J,
                                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector z,
                                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector p0)
        Solves the nonlinear least-squares problem defined by the arguments. Delegates to the Levenberg-Marquardt method.
        Parameters:
        V - the "value" function, V(p) must return a vector for the current parameters p
        J - the "Jacobian" function, J(p) must return a matrix for the current parameters p
        z - the vector of observed ("target") values
        p0 - initial parameter vector
        Returns:
        the vector of optimal parameters

      • solveLevenvergMarquardt

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector solveLevenvergMarquardt​(org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction V,
                                                                                 org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction J,
                                                                                 org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector z,
                                                                                 org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector p0)
        Solves the nonlinear least-squares problem defined by the arguments using Levenberg-Marquardt optimization.
        Parameters:
        V - the "value" function, V(p) must return a vector for the current parameters p
        J - the "Jacobian" function, J(p) must return a matrix for the current parameters p
        z - the vector of observed ("target") values
        p0 - initial parameter vector
        Returns:
        the vector of optimal parameters

        Solves the nonlinear least-squares problem defined by the arguments using Gauss-Newton optimization.
        Parameters:

        J - the "Jacobian" function, J(p) must return a matrix for the current parameters p
        z - the vector of observed ("target") values
        p0 - initial parameter vector
        Returns:
        the vector of optimal parameters
